# 码农翻身全年文章精华 2017

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-2017
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-2017
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-2017
manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-2017 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-erlingyiqi
manong-fanshen-quannian-wenzhang-jinghua-erlingyiqi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
